timeline.bodyText: I thought the default Android Studio magic formatter aligned the description text start across params, but I've seen inconsistencies in this project. Maybe my settings are wrong.
timeline.author: jpignata
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -81,11 +75,11 @@ public static Builder builder() {
     /**
      * Begin building a new instance of {@link DataStoreConfiguration} by reading DataStore
      * settings from the config file and an optional set of user-provided overrides.
-     * @param pluginJson DataStore plugin configuration from amplicationconfiguration.json
-     * @param userProvidedConfiguration An instance of {@DataStoreConfiguration} with settings specified by the user
+     * @param pluginJson DataStore plugin configuration from amplifyconfiguration.json

replies.bodyText:
Hm, I'm not sure what the default setting is.
I agree that it is currently inconsistent in this code base. I'm actually thrilled though that we have inconsistencies at this level of detail. The one that bothers me more is the +8 indentation found some places.
replies.author: jamesonwilliams

timeline.bodyText: Was this unused or from the other PR?
timeline.author: jpignata

timeline.bodyText: One day, I'll know when this suppression is necessary and when it isn't. ;) Still on my list to dig into https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-android/pull/442/files#r422430836.
timeline.author: jpignata
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,19 +30,16 @@
 /**
  * Configuration options for {@link AWSDataStorePlugin}.
  */
+@SuppressWarnings("WeakerAccess") // This is a public API. Public methods available to user's package(s).

replies.bodyText:
Oops, I had missed those. Added some info here:
https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-android/pull/442/files#r426205557
replies.author: jamesonwilliams
